titleStmt.title: Non vltra, or, A letter to a learned Cartesian settling the rule of truth, and first principles, upon their deepest grounds / by J.S.
titleStmt.author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Sergeant by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
